title: Modified photoanode by in situ growth of covalent organic frameworks on BiVO4 for oxygen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9609-9618
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00899E, Paper

Anni Guo, Xingchun Wu, Syed Husnain Ali, Huawei Shen, Ligong Chen, Yang Li, Bowei Wang
COF-Azo and COF-Ben are grown in situ on a modified BiVO4 photoanode, which exhibit better catalytic performance in OER.
